caption:
The photograph presents an aerial view of a large, well-manicured estate located next to a body of water, likely a lake. The estate features several buildings, including a large main house with a rounded portion and at least two smaller auxiliary buildings. The architecture appears luxurious, with expansive windows and terraces.

The property is surrounded by a vast lawn with numerous tall trees providing ample shade and visual interest. The landscaping is meticulously maintained, with clear and organized paths and a few flowerbeds visible.

Surrounding the estate, the lake seems to form a natural boundary, bending around the property gracefully. There are isolated trees or small pieces of land within the lake, which provide a picturesque element to the scene.

Overall, the image conveys a sense of seclusion and privacy, emphasizing the beauty and tranquility of the location. The composition of the photograph, with the large expanse of water framing the lush green estate, enhances the scenic and serene environment.
title: Kings River citrus ranch below Pine Flat Dam
